variable.name: AA
variable.comment: Started collecting this outcome in Ext2. It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: AADY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Aortic Aneurism

variable.name: ANGINA
variable.comment: Angina was adjudicated for CT and OS participants during the core WHI study. Angina occurring on or after a Clinical MI is not counted.

variable.name: ANGINADY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Angina

variable.name: ANGINASRC
variable.comment: Angina was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: AANEUR
variable.comment: Started collecting this outcome in Ext2. It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: AANEURDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Aortic Aneurysm

variable.name: ADISSECT
variable.comment: Started collecting this outcome in Ext2. It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: ADISSECTDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Aortic Dissection

variable.name: AFIBR
variable.comment: Started collecting this outcome in Ext2. It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: AFIBRDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Atrial Fibrillation

variable.name: CABG
variable.comment: Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) CABG was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: CABGDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first CABG

variable.name: CABGSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for CABG. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CAROTID
variable.comment: Carotid Artery Disease was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. Carotid Artery Disease occurring on or after a Stroke is not counted.

variable.name: CAROTIDDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Carotid Artery Disease
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Carotid Artery Disease

variable.name: CAROTIDSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Carotid Artery Disease. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CHD
variable.comment: Coronary Heart Disease (CHD) Defined as the first occurence of Clinical MI, Definite Silent MI or a Death due to CHD (defined before 10/99), Definite CHD or Possible CHD. Through Ext1 some of these outcomes are only adjudicated for a subset of WHI participants. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: CHDDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first CHD

variable.name: CHDSRC
variable.comment: The ascertainment processes vary for these outcomes. Refer to their usage notes.

variable.name: CHF
variable.comment: Congestive Heart Failure (CHF) CHF was adjudicated for CT and OS participants during the core WHI study. CHF was not adjudicated during Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: CHFDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first CHF

variable.name: CHFSRC
variable.comment: CHF was adjudicated locally during the core WHI study. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: MI
variable.comment: Clinical MI was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: MIDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Clinical MI

variable.name: MISRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, central adjudications of Clinical MI were only done for HT participants. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CREVASC
variable.comment: Coronary revascularization procedure (CABG or PTCA) Defined as the first occurence of CABG or PTCA. Coronary Revascularization was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: CREVASCDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Coronary Revascularization

variable.name: CREVASCSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Coronary Revascularization. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: DSMI
variable.comment: Defined as an ECG with an evolving Q-wave MI based on an incident Novacode of 5.1 or 5.2. ECGs were adjudicated for CT participants at baseline, av3, av6 and av9. Definite Silent MI occurring on or after a Clinical MI is not counted.

variable.name: DSMIDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Definite Silent MI
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Definite Silent MI

variable.name: DVT
variable.comment: Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) DVT was only adjudicated for HT participants until Ext2. In Ext2 it is adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: DVTDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first DVT

variable.name: DVTSRC
variable.comment: If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: HEARTVALVE
variable.comment: Moderate to severe valvular disease involving one or more valves Started collecting this outcome in Ext2. It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: HEARTVALVEDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Heart Valve Disease
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Heart Valve Disease

variable.name: STRKHEMO
variable.comment: Defined as a Stroke where the diagnosis question indicates a hemorrhagic stroke. It was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. Form 121 and early versions of 132 were not able to record Hemorrhagic/Ischemic classification for procedure related Strokes.

variable.name: STRKHEMODY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Hemorrhagic Stroke

variable.name: STRKISCH
variable.comment: Defined as a Stroke where the diagnosis question indicates an iscemic stroke. Ischemic Stroke was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. Form 121 and early versions of 132 were not able to record Hemorrhagic/Ischemic classification for procedure related Strokes.

variable.name: STRKISCHDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Ischemic Stroke

variable.name: PERIPH
variable.comment: Peripheral Arterial Disease (PAD) PAD was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: PERIPHDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first PAD

variable.name: PERIPHSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for PAD. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: PE
variable.comment: Pulmonary Embolism (PE) Defined as the first occurence of PE or a Death due to Pulmonary Embolism. PE was only adjudicated for HT participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: PEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first PE

variable.name: PSMI
variable.comment: Defined as an ECG with an evolving Q-wave MI based on an incident Novacode of 5.3 or 5.4. ECGs were adjudicated for CT participants at baseline, av3, av6 and av9. Possible Silent MI occurring on or after a Clinical MI or Definite Silent MI is not counted.

variable.name: PSMIDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Possible Silent MI
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Possible Silent MI

variable.name: PTCA
variable.comment: Percutaneous Transluminal Coronary Angioplasty (PTCA) PTCA was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: PTCADY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first PTCA

variable.name: PTCASRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for PTCA. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: STROKE
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Stroke or a Death due to Cerebrovascular. Stroke was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. In order to be able to classify strokes, WHI uses central adjudications if possible, even though Strokes were only fully centrally adjudicated in HT participants.

variable.name: STROKEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Stroke

variable.name: STROKESRC
variable.comment: These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Stroke. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: TIA
variable.comment: Transient Ischemic Attack (TIA) TIA was adjudicated for CT and OS participants during the core WHI study. TIA occurring on or after a Stroke is not counted.

variable.name: TIADY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first TIA

variable.name: TIASRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, central adjudications of TIA were only done for HT participants. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: MITOTAL
variable.comment: Defined as: For CT, the first occurrence of Clinical MI or Definite Silent MI. For OS, the first Clinical MI only.

variable.name: MITOTALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Total MI

variable.name: ANYCANCER
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of any cancer (except non melanoma skin cancer) or a Death due to cancer. Any Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ANYCANCERDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Any Cancer

variable.name: ANYCANCERSRC
variable.comment: These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Any Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: SINUS
variable.comment: Accessory Sinus Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: SINUSDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Accessory Sinus Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Accessory Sinus Cancer

variable.name: SINUSSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Accessory Sinus Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: ADRENAL
variable.comment: Adrenal Gland Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ADRENALDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Adrenal Gland Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Adrenal Gland Cancer

variable.name: ADRENALSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Adrenal Gland Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: ANAL
variable.comment: Anus Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ANALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Anus Cancer

variable.name: ANALSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Anus Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: APPENDIX
variable.comment: Appendix Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: APPENDIXDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Appendix Cancer

variable.name: APPENDIXSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Appendix Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: BASETONGUE
variable.comment: Base Of Tongue Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BASETONGUEDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Base Of Tongue Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Base Of Tongue Cancer

variable.name: BASETONGUESRC
variable.description: Base Of Tongue Cancer ascertainment source
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Base Of Tongue Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: BILIARY
variable.comment: Biliary Tract Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BILIARYDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Biliary Tract Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Biliary Tract Cancer

variable.name: BILIARYSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Biliary Tract Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: BLADDER
variable.comment: Bladder Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BLADDERDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Bladder Cancer

variable.name: BLADDERSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Bladder Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: BONELIMB
variable.comment: Cancer of the bones, joints or cartilage of limbs (long bones) Bone-Limb Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BONELIMBDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Bone-Limb Cancer

variable.name: BONELIMBSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Bone-Limb Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: BONENON
variable.comment: Cancer of the bones, joints or cartilage of non-limbs (face, head, torso, spine). Bone-Non Limb Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BONENONDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Bone-Non Limb Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Bone-Non Limb Cancer

variable.name: BONENONSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Bone-Non Limb Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: BRAIN
variable.comment: Brain Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BRAINDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Brain Cancer

variable.name: BRAINSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Brain Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: BREAST
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Invasive or In Situ Breast Cancer. All Deaths due to breast cancer are considered Invasive Breast Cancers. Breast Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BREASTDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Breast Cancer

variable.name: BREASTSRC
variable.comment: These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Breast Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: BREASTINV
variable.comment: Defined as a breast cancer from a Death or the first adjudication where the form 122 or 130 details indicate an invasive cancer. Breast Cancer Invasive is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. WHI adjudicated all reports of breast cancer for a ppt until the first invasive Breast Cancer. i.e. The first Invasive Breast Cancer may not be the first Breast Cancer.

variable.name: BREASTINVDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Breast Cancer Invasive
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Breast Cancer Invasive

variable.name: BREASTINVSRC
variable.comment: These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Breast Cancer Invasive. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: BREASTINSITU
variable.comment: Defined as the first breast cancer where the form 122 or 130 details indicate an in situ cancer. Breast Cancer In Situ is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. Breast Cancer In Situ occurring on or after a Breast Cancer Invasive is not counted.

variable.name: BREASTINSITUDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Breast Cancer In Situ
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Breast Cancer In Situ

variable.name: BREASTINSITUSRC
variable.description: Breast Cancer In Situ ascertainment source
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Breast Cancer In Situ. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: CNSCA
variable.comment: Cancer of central nervous system (not brain) Central Nervous System Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: CNSCADY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Central Nervous System Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Central Nervous System Cancer

variable.name: CNSCASRC
variable.description: Central Nervous System Cancer ascertainment source
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Central Nervous System Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: CERVICAL
variable.comment: Cervix Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: CERVICALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Cervix Cancer

variable.name: CERVICALSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Cervix Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: COLON
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Colon Cancer or a Death due to Colon Cancer. Colon Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: COLONDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Colon Cancer

variable.name: COLONSRC
variable.comment: These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Colon Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: COLORECTAL
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Colon Cancer, Rectosigmoid Cancer, Rectum Cancer or a Death due to Colon Cancer, Rectosigmoid Cancer or Rectum Cancer. Colorectal Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: COLORECTALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Colorectal Cancer

variable.name: COLORECTALSRC
variable.comment: These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Colorectal Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: CONNECTIVE
variable.comment: Cancer of connective, subcutaneous and soft tissues Connective Tissue Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: CONNECTIVEDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Connective Tissue Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Connective Tissue Cancer

variable.name: CONNECTIVESRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Connective Tissue Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: ENDOCRINE
variable.comment: Cancer of endocrine glands and related structures Endocrine Glands Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ENDOCRINEDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Endocrine Glands Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Endocrine Glands Cancer

variable.name: ENDOCRINESRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Endocrine Glands Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: ENDMTRL
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Endometrial Cancer or a Death due to Endometrial Cancer. Endometrial Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ENDMTRLDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Endometrial Cancer

variable.name: ENDMTRLSRC
variable.comment: These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Endometrial Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: ESOPHAGUSSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Esophagus Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.comment: Eye and Adnexa Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.description: Days enrollment to Eye and Adnexa Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Eye and Adnexa Cancer

variable.name: EYESRC

variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Eye and Adnexa Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: GALLBLDRSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Gallbladder Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: GENITAL
variable.comment: Cancer of genital organs, other or unspecified Genital Organs Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Genital Organs Cancer

variable.name: GENITALSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Genital Organs Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: HEARTSRC

variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Lymphoma Non Hodgkins

variable.name: LYMPHOMASRC

variable.name: MELANOMASRC

variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Other Lip Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: OVARY
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Ovarian Cancer or a Death due to Ovarian Cancer. Ovarian Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: OVARYDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Ovarian Cancer

variable.name: OVARYSRC
variable.comment: These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Ovarian Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: PALATE
variable.comment: Palate Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: PALATEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Palate Cancer

variable.name: PALATESRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Palate Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: ANYFX
variable.comment: Defined as the first fracture of Hip, upper leg, pelvis, knee, lower leg, ankle, foot(not toe), tailbone, spine or back, lower arm or wrist, hand (not finger), elbow, upper arm or shoulder and other. Some of these outcomes are only adjudicated for a subset of WHI participants.

variable.name: ANYFXDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Any Adjudicated Fracture
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Any Adjudicated Fracture

variable.name: ANYFXSRC
variable.comment: The ascertainment processes vary for these outcomes. Refer to their usage notes.

variable.name: BKANKLE
variable.comment: Ankle Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Ankle Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKANKLEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Ankle Fracture

variable.name: BKANKLESRC
variable.comment: Ankle Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKCARPAL
variable.comment: Carpal bones in wrist Carpal Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Carpal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCARPALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Carpal Fracture

variable.name: BKCARPALSRC
variable.comment: Carpal Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKCLAVICLE

variable.name: BKCLAVICLESRC
variable.comment: Clavical Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Elbow NOS Fracture

variable.name: BKELBOWNOSSRC
variable.comment: Elbow NOS Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKHIP

variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Hip Fracture

variable.name: BKHIPSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Hip Fracture. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Shaft of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Shaft of Humerus Fracture

variable.name: BKOHUMERUSSRC

variable.description: Days enrollment to Tibial Plateau Fracture
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Tibial Plateau Fracture

variable.name: BKTIBIALSRC
variable.comment: Tibial Plateau Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKUHUMERUS
variable.comment: Upper End of Humerus Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Upper End of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUHUMERUSDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Upper End of Humerus Fracture
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Upper End of Humerus Fracture

variable.name: BKUHUMERUSSRC
variable.description: Upper End of Humerus Fracture ascertainment source
variable.comment: Upper End of Humerus Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKUELBOW
variable.comment: Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUELBOWDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture

variable.name: BKUELBOWSRC
variable.comment: Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKSPINE
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Lumbar Spine Fracture or Thoracic Spine Fracture. Vertebral Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. It was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Does not include cervical fractures.

variable.name: BKSPINEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Vertebral Fracture

variable.name: BKSPINESRC
variable.comment: Vertebral Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: DEATH
variable.comment: This variable includes adjudicated and non adjudicated deaths. Death was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2, death is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort (MRC). Non MRC cause of death is determined by the initial cause of death form (form 120).

variable.name: DEATHCAUSE
variable.comment: 'Not adjudicated' are reported deaths that have not been adjudicated either because the adjudication is in proceses or WHI was unable to get sufficient documentation to perform an adjudication.

variable.name: DEATHDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Death

variable.name: DEATHSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, central adjudications of Death were only done in the CT. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: HYST
variable.comment: Hysterectomy was adjudicated for HT participants only. It was not adjudicated after Ext1.

variable.name: HYSTDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Hysterectomy

variable.name: HYSTSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Hysterectomy. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: ENDWHIDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to end of WHI core study followup
variable.comment: ENDWHIDY should only be used for analyses censoring follow-up at the end of the WHI core study.

variable.name: ENDEXT1DY
variable.description: Days enrollment to end of Ext1 followup
variable.comment: ENDEXT1DY should only be used for analyses censoring follow-up at the end of Ext1.

variable.name: ENDFOLLOWDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to end of followup
variable.comment: ENDFOLLOWDY should be used for analyses utilizing all WHI, Ext1 and Ext2 follow-up.
